about.title: About Me
about.description:
With 5+ years of experience and direct and indirect engagement with 140K+ end-users, I am proud to have collaborated with numerous teams and service providers ranging from startups to multibillion-dollar businesses, including Meta (Facebook) and Airbnb.

I have proven multiple times to be capable of effective communication with executives, coworkers, and consumers.

Consistently, I am ready to deliver unmatched profitability, innovation, scalability, and accessibility to your team and products.
